snippet.title: Touch my Katamari - PS Vita - Billiard trailer
snippet.description:
Innovative Gameplay -- Roll the Katamari in any direction using the multi-touch screen of the PS®Vita, while for the first time ever the console's rear touch pad lets you stretch or squeeze the Katamari to gather more objects at once or fit through a narrow space.

Touch my Katamari will be available soon on Playstation Vita.

For more information, please visit your local Namco Bandai Games website http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
